title: Remake in Tournament Beta
body:
Ok, I got a problem. One of our players had issues to connect to the game in our first tournament beta match.
Ingame we tried to use /pause, but even after our whole team and some enemies (after asking them) used the command it just didn't pause.
So we voted to remake the game. Our player that had the issues is currently restarting his computer, the rest of us is stuck in the queue without finding a game.

Is any Rioter here that can help us to restart the game once he's there? (which should be soon)

replies.body:
Probleme sind bereits bekannt, es handelt sich hier um die Beta und alles wird noch getestet.. es können durchaus Probleme auftreten. 

> ## Network Operations – vor 22 Minuten
> Das heutige Clash-Turnier auf EUW wurde aufgrund technischer Probleme abgebrochen. Alle benutzten Tickets werden zurückgegeben. Wir werden das Turnier am Samstag neu starten.

Mehr Infos -> https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tAPu0EEX-clash-beta-issues-15-dec
Nope  im stil  stuck  in the  Tournament menu
I think the houle tournament part has frozen probably instabile server (my guess) so you will be stuck there for a while
A freind of mine is playing ( he is now even in the second game). So it isnt the whole tounament

> [{quoted}](name=DxDxD2,realm=EUW,application-id=7hciEY9w,discussion-id=7gQpvuIg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-15T20:50:23.540+0000)

its has been fixed by now it was a bug for the ppl that didnt join imidiatly or was alone i guess
some of my friends are in the secoundgame aswell

Welcome to the club.
